ssot__AccountContact__dlm.name: Account Contact
ssot__AccountContact__dlm.description: The Account Contact DMO represents an individual who has a role specific to an account.

ssot__AccountId__c.description: A reference ID to the account where this contact is included or linked.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the account contact DMO.

ssot__AccountContactRoles__c.description: The business role of the contact at the account.

ssot__AssistantName__c.description: The name of the contact’s assistant.

ssot__AssistantPhone__c.description: The phone number of the assistant.

ssot__BusinessPhoneId__c.description: A reference ID to the phone number for the contact.

ssot__ContactEmailId__c.description: A reference ID to the email address for the contact.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DepartmentName__c.description: The department the contact works in.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FaxPhoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the fax number for the contact.

ssot__FirstName__c.description: The first name of the contact.

ssot__HomePhoneId__c.description: A reference ID for the home phone number for the contact.

ssot__IndirectRelationAccountContactId__.description: A reference ID to a contact with an indirect relationship to the account contact.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID for the person that is the contact for the account.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastActivityDate__c.description: The date of the most recent account activity.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LastName__c.description: The last name of the contact.

ssot__MailingAddressId__c.description: A reference ID to the mailing address.

ssot__MaritalStatus__c.description: The marital status of the contact.

ssot__MiddleName__c.description: The middle name of the contact.

ssot__MobilePhoneId__c.description: A reference ID to the contact’s mobile phone number.

ssot__OtherContactAddressId__c.description: A reference ID to another contact address.

ssot__PersonName__c.description: The person name of the contact.

ssot__ReportsToAccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID to the contact’s manager.

ssot__Title__c.description: The contact’s title for example, vice president or specialist.
